name: Snake & Color Blocks
description:
Play Slither Snake & Color Blocks for hours and get to be number 1 in the world! Use only 1 finger to play and break as many more boxes better.

It is very easy to play, but very difficult to get high scores.

In Snake & Color Blocks you can find:
- Endless game
-Control very simple
-Hundreds of hours of fun with Snake & Color Blocks
-Competition with the whole world
-Snake & Color Blocks is very light

What are you waiting for to try Snake & Color Blocks? Download it and have fun!
